title: Cocktails
short: A cocktail recipe site, for lovers of alcoholic drinks!
description: Cocktails is a website made with an other student for a school project.
It's a website where you can find cocktail recipes, add them in your favorites, and browse the entire cocktail's database by selecting filters and ingredients!
The website is made with HTML/CSS/JavaScript and TailwindCSS, and is using an API written in PHP.
The entire project is available on my website (link below), for you to try it out!
